snippet: French prosecutors’ wide-ranging probe into track and field’s governing body could expand to Eugene, Ore., and perhaps even Nike.
abstract: France opens investigation into International Assn of Athletics Federations' decision to award 2021 track and field world championships to Eugene, Ore, without bidding contest.
lead_paragraph: French prosecutors’ wide-ranging probe into track and field’s governing body could expand to Eugene, Ore., and perhaps even Nike.

headline.main: France Investigates Decision to Hold Worlds in Oregon
headline.print_headline: France Investigates Decision to Hold Worlds in Oregon
